title: Manage Landfill Methane Gas Levels
description: Sensors at the city landfill report rising methane gas levels, requiring an operator to activate the gas flare system.

tasks.description: Receive a 'High Methane Level' alert from the landfill monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the environmental safety alert.

tasks.description: Verify the readings from multiple sensors to confirm the high methane levels are widespread.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the validity of the alert.

tasks.description: Remotely activate the landfill's gas flare system to safely burn off the excess methane.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully activates the flare system.
